sentences.sentence: When Mary starts talking, no one else can get a word in edgeways.
sentences.translation: 玛丽讲起话来，别人谁也插不上嘴。

sentences.sentence: You'll only get the desk through the door if you turn it edgeways.
sentences.translation: 你要把书桌侧着才能搬过这道门。

sentences.sentence: He talks so much that no one else can get a word in edgeways.
sentences.translation: 他讲得太多了，别人一句话也插不上嘴。
